body.name: SEVEN WARRIOR L Shaped Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, 58” Reversible Computer Desk with Storage Shelf & Monitor Stand, Corner Desk with Cup Holder, with Headphone Hook, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 11 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: BIFMA LEVEL certifies furniture products by reviewing corporate, facility, and product manufacturing processes against environmental impact, health and wellness, and social responsibility criteria. LEVEL 1

features: 【Powerful Charging Station】The L shaped gaming desk includes a built-in power strip with 4-Outlet & 2 USB Ports & 1 Type C Port, which can easily charge smart phones, computer, tablet, notebook or gaming gears and provide power for up to 7 devices.

【Cool & Smart LED Lights】The gaming desk comes with RGB LED light, remote control via APP, 12 modes for your to choose. The LED light color can vary through APP Control and create a unique gaming atmosphere. It features memory function which keeps the LED lights staying on last mode when turned on.

【User Friendly Design】The L shaped corner desk allows for reversible installation and can be transformed into a long double desk as you need. The 99.6 inch size allows two person to play game or work together side by side.The 3-tier storage shelves can place left or right as your preference.The gaming desk is equipped with full monitor stand that offers more space and allows you to sit with better posture. The cup holder and hook keep your drinks and headphones right at your fingertips.

【Ample Storage Space】L Shaped dimensions are 58"(L) x 18.9"(W) x 29.0"(H)or dimension of the long gamer desk are 99.6"(L) x 18.9"(W) x 29.5"(H). Coming with 3 tier storage shelves. The 3-tier storage shelves offer ample storage space for computer, Pads, books, files and other supplies.
【More Stability & Sturdy】 The heavy-duty X-shaped legs offer more stability. Adjustable leg pads ensure the table keeps a sturdy construction even on uneven ground without wobbling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Desk for a super low price
reviews.reviewText: For years I was tormented by having limited desk space with my old desk. I had nowhere to put anything, and it was a cramped affair. This desk changed everything for me. I now have a place to put everything I want, right at my finger tips. I've got 2 work stations in an L shape, and so much room left over to put things that it's crazy. My full size PC tower fits perfectly under the shelves provided that go on the side. (Keep in mind that these shelves are mandatory to put on one side or the other. You cannot build this desk without the end cap book shelf). I am able to put my PS4 here with a second monitor, I've got room to store my PS Vita's and PS TV, my DAP, and my gaming laptop all in one. I've ever got enough room to put the storage bins there, and a few handfuls of games on the shelf. And I STILL have more room! This desk arrived in a compact box, and I was able to put it together by myself in 5 hours with hand tools that this company provided in the box(it'll be a lot less if you break out the power tools, which I was just too lazy to do.) Everything went together dummy easy and the instructions are very clear. The LEDs come in strips you'll have to put on by yourself, and are easy to use with the provided physical controller, and an app you can download. (It uses your location, so be careful when using it. I just use the controller most of the time and it does just fine on its own) This desk also comes with a straight piece, so you can assemble this desk straight outwards if you don't want the L shape. It's included in the box at NO EXTRA CHARGE! The cupholder can hold a full 32 oz bottle of orange juice without an issue, and the headphone holders are very helpful and will hold 2 full size sets of headphones.(pictured is my steel series wired and a set of astros I later threw in the bin because they gave out) Though the material used is the compressed wood, the way it's put together suggests serious quality control, and the end result is marvelous. The carbon fiber material they used is a great texture and doesn't scratch easily or get super dirty with use. Overall, this one gets 5 stars from me. For $140 you'd be very VERY hard pressed to find a better desk. I'd highly recommend this for multitasking as well. I use mine for work projects as well as gaming, and it'll handle the heat from a soldering iron just fine. Again, GREAT purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So we are using the desk as a long straight desk instead of an L shaped desk. It fits 2 people COMFORTABLY. Lots of space! The LEDs are easy to hook up and use! Very user friendly set up! Love the look and obviously you can two large monitors or small whatever you decide! But it fits it all perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk thinking “It’s a desk off of Amazon, how good could it be.” Well I was mistaken! This desk is great quality and I love the size. The price is a steal for what the desk actually is! Assembly took a little longer than expected but all the bolts went in good and it all came together. I highly recommend this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as pictured. Easy to assemble. Love the look! My son is very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is priced very well the laminate is heavier than normal with a nice carbon fiber finish. The USB and outlet port is very nice to have. And the leds have a nice push button switch to turn on and off and to change colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desk was perfect for my pre-teen gaming son. It was the perfect size for his room. Very spacious. The directions were a little confusing but overall it was easy to assemble. I really like that it has an outlet on the desk with several different ports for charging, and the outlet for the LED is pretty cool as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It worths every dollar!
reviews.reviewText: The design is amazing, it’s elegant and looks so fancy.My main two problems, the lighting box is cheap material and buttons are stuck.And the second problem is it’s not deep enough to put the screen a little bit away from my eyes which caused me some headache since I have a big monitor.Other than that it looks really really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy moly, it's incredible!!
reviews.reviewText: So, wow. This took my 11 yr old and I a few hours to put together but only because there are so many screws!! But this backs up how sturdy this desk is! This desk is beyond what I was expecting. It's stable, sturdy, the materials are solid. Absolutely not a cheap desk. Top notch quality. Just get it. You will be so happy ypu did. Normally, I keep boxes just in case we have to return, but I threw the box for this out. Won't be returning. This is a quality desk and we are beyond thrilled with it! My son now has an incredible gaming set up!

Me gusto mucho la configuración gamer que tiene, en mi caso lo deje en forma de I y da mucho espacio para todo lo que uno desee poner en el escritorio, es robusto sin embargo seria mejor si fuera un poco mas macizo, el tiempo de ensamblaje es algo largo, quizá 45min-1hora.Me encanta mi nuevo escritorio!!
Arrived quickly and looks great set up… exactly what I was looking for. Set up was fairly easy if you’re used to building flat pack furniture, a lot of pieces though.

reviews.reviewTitle: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO Y ATENCIÓN DEL VENDEDOR
reviews.reviewText: Desgraciadamente en la primer entrega el escritorio llegó roto, la tabla principal estaba partida, pero me contacté con el vendedor y fueron muy amables y rápidos; me ofrecieron solo enviarme la parte dañada para no hacer una devolución completa y así poder conservar el producto; así lo hicimos. El escritorio es muy bonito y funcional la calidad en general es buena. Si lo recomiendo.

Very convenient set up.Lighting is cool.I love this desk.Got two, one for me and the wife.Couple of points to consider.Putting together is a time consuming process and needs two people.Depth isn't spectacular. Feels a bit close to the monitors, but you adjust.Takes a lot more space than you realize. Make sure to measure before purchase.Still recommend whole heartedly.
The media could not be loaded. Mi hijo encantado con su espacio gamer instrucciones faciles para su armado todo bien llegó antes de tiempo
